alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida and northeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 256 PM EDT/156 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Chipley to 13 miles southwest of Marianna to 6 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Blountstown, Marianna, Chattahoochee, Malone, Sneads, Bristol, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Alford, Bascom, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs and Chipola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
